europeana:record.dc:title: Deep-sea shrimps of the genus Bythocaris G.O. Sars in the collections of Russian museums, with the description of a new species (Crustacea: Decapoda: Hippolytidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Sokolov V.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Crustacea
Decapoda
Caridea
Hippolytidae
Bythocaris
new species
Russian museums
europeana:record.dc:description: The collections of Bythocaris in Russian museums and research institutes were studied. Three species, B. biruli Kobjakova, 1964, B. curvirostris Kobjakova, 1957 and B. irene Retovsky, 1946, are redescribed, and a new species, B. kobjakovae spec. nov. is described. The intra-specific variation of six species of Bythocaris is analysed. A key to the known species of the genus is provided.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Deep-sea shrimps of the genus Bythocaris G.O. Sars in the collections of Russian museums, with the description of a new species (Crustacea: Decapoda: Hippolytidae) (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 74, 18-24)
